awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE IOWA TRIBE OF OKLAHOMA TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY OF OFFICE STAFF TO LEARN AND ADDRESS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES, PROVIDE OUTREACH, IMPLEMENT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PRACTICES AND STRATEGIES TO PREVENT ILLEGAL DUMPING, AND CAPACITY  DEVELOPMENT OF THE WATER QUALITY PROGRAM BY INCREASING TECHNICAL AND ANALYTICAL CAPABILITIES.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE IOWA TRIBE OF OKLAHOMA TO IMPLEMENT ITS PROJECT TO DEVELOP TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL CAPACITY. ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY OF OFFICE STAFF TO LEARN AND ADDRESS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES, PROVIDE OUTREACH, IMPLEMENT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PRACTICES AND STRATEGIES TO PREVENT ILLEGAL DUMPING, AND CAPACITY DEVELOPMENT OF THE WATER QUALITY PROGRAM BY INCREASING TECHNICAL AND ANALYTICAL CAPABILITIES.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FEDERAL FINANCIAL REPORT, QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN. THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE IOWA TRIBE OF OKLAHOMA.

PROJECT TITLE: IOWA TRIBE OF OKLAHOMA TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING FY 2024 :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL TRANSPORTATION FUNDING PROVIDED BY FHWA TO IOWA TRIBE OF OKLAHOMA UNDER THE FHWA OTT PROGRAM AGREEMENT FOR FY24
